Education.Institution: SRM Institute of Science and Technology

Responsibilities: Explored emerging technologies and trends through virtual workshops, webinars, and self-paced learning modules.
Covered topics in data analysis, development, and cyber security.
Engaged in coding challenges and problem-solving exercises to apply theoretical knowledge to real-world scenarios.
Tackled complex AI/ML problems, collaborated with peers, and delivered solutions within specified timelines.
Collaborated with industry experts and mentors, receiving guidance, feedback, and insights into the latest trends and best practices in AI/ML.

Projects.Name: E-Krushi
Description: E-Krushi is a dynamic farming website combining HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React.js to deliver essential agricultural insights.
HTML structures the content, defining elements like crop profiles and watering tips.
CSS ensures a visually appealing and responsive layout.
JavaScript adds interactivity, enabling features such as dropdown menus and real-time updates.
React.js facilitates component-based development, optimizing code reusability and scalability.

Projects.Name: Binary Babble
Description: Binary Babble is a sophisticated TCP chat application coded in Python, featuring advanced functionalities and admin control.
Users engage in real-time communication over TCP/IP, facilitated by Pythonâ€™s robust networking capabilities.
The admin, with a password-protected interface, possesses exclusive monitoring privileges.
Prioritizes user privacy and data integrity through secure authentication mechanisms and encrypted transmissions.

Projects.Name: Know Me
Description: Know Me is a web project where HTML provides the structural foundation, CSS adds style, and JavaScript enhances interactivity.
Implemented to create a captivating and responsive web experience, allowing visitors to explore projects, skills, and contact information effortlessly.
